arabicText: وَمَا يُؤْمِنُ أَكْثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	most	of	them	are	such	that	they	do	not	
believe in	 Allah except	 while	 ascribing	
partners	(to	Him)!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	aksar	woh	haiñ	ke	Allāh	par	
yaqin	nahiñ	lāte	magar	shirk	karte	huye

arabicText: أَفَأَمِنُوٓا۟ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمْ غَـٰشِيَةٌۭ مِّنْ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةًۭ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	 they	 remain	 complacent	 over	 Allah’s	
punishment	 coming	 and	 surrounding	
them,	 or	 the	 Last	 Day	 coming	 suddenly	
upon	them	whilst	they	are	unaware?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā	is	se	nidar	ho	baithe	ke	Allāh	kā áƶāb	
unheñ	 ākar	 gher	 le	 yā	 qiyāmat	 un	 par	
achānak	āajāye	aur	unheñ	khabar	na	ho
